revised_title: Exploration and Mapping of Great Tartary
tldr: The author, Nicholas Witsen, shares his extensive experience and research in mapping the vast and challenging terrain of Great Tartary. He discusses the difficulties he faced in gathering information and the methods he used to create a comprehensive map of the region. Witsen also addresses some of the uncertainties and potential errors in his work and shares his thoughts on the possibility of a North-East passage to America.
